info.name: FU News Management System API - Test Cases
info.description: Comprehensive test cases for all API endpoints with pass/fail assertions

exec: pm.test("Status code is 200", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.code).to.equal(200);
pm.test("Response is success", function () {
var jsonData = pm.response.json();
pm.expect(jsonData.isSuccess).to.be.true;
pm.test("Response has account data", function () {
var jsonData = pm.response.json();
pm.expect(jsonData.value).to.have.property('data');
pm.expect(jsonData.value.data).to.have.property('accountID');
pm.expect(jsonData.value.data).to.have.property('accountName');
pm.expect(jsonData.value.data).to.have.property('accountEmail');
pm.test("Email matches request", function () {
var jsonData = pm.response.json();
pm.expect(jsonData.value.data.accountEmail).to.equal('testuser@funews.edu.vn');
if (pm.response.code === 200) {
var jsonData = pm.response.json();
pm.environment.set('createdAccountID', jsonData.value.data.accountID);
pm.environment.set('createdAccountName', jsonData.value.data.accountName);
pm.environment.set('createdAccountEmail', jsonData.value.data.accountEmail);
console.log('Account ID saved: ' + jsonData.value.data.accountID);
} else {
console.log('Register failed with status: ' + pm.response.code);
console.log('Response: ' + JSON.stringify(pm.response.json()));
var accountID = pm.environment.get('createdAccountID');
console.log('Pre-request: createdAccountID = ' + accountID);
if (!accountID || accountID === '') {
console.warn('WARNING: createdAccountID is empty or not set. Make sure to run Register - Success first.');
